text: Tagra iga vugahune? Nerafu'zama hu'za ana mopafima mani'naza vahe'mo'za tagrira tagatere'za za'za hu'za ranra vahe manizageno, ranra kumazamimofona hankavenentake vihu hugagizageno, Anaki ranra vahetamimofo mofavrezaga ke'none hu'za eme tasami'naza kemo'a tagu'amofona tazeri fakro fakro hu'ne.
